entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.8°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %

Dewpoint: -15.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 late this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
